item.title: Easy Summer Tomato and Eggplant Pie
item.description: Enjoy a fresh summer tomato and eggplant pie, perfect for a light vegetarian meal or Mediterranean diet. This easy recipe uses simple ingredients and brings seasonal flavors to your table.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 30 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 45 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 4

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 2 medium eggplants, sliced
  • 4 ripe tomatoes, sliced
  • 1 cup mozzarella cheese, shredded
  • 1 tablespoon olive oil
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • Fresh basil for garnish

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
  2. Layer the sliced eggplants and tomatoes in a pie dish.
  3. Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper.
  4. Top with shredded mozzarella cheese.
  5. Bake for 30 minutes or until the cheese is bubbly and golden.
